successes.title: Inboard: The World's First Skateboard with In-Wheel Motors
successes.description: An electric skateboard without compromise. With powerful dual       in-wheel motors and the ability to change batteries on the fly, you'll get tired before the board does.

Pledges.description: Thank you for your support of the Inboard Monolith! We can't wait to share our progress with you. All of our backers will have access to our private Instagram account: @inboardLTD. You'll get a sneak peek at new products, promotions and everything going on at HQ.
Show your love for Inboard with our vinyl sticker pack. Stick them on your board, helmet, laptop, everywhere!
Get your own exclusive Inboard T-Shirt. Ride around town in this ultra light and comfortable tee.
Be one of the first with our exclusive Inboard Snap-Back hat. Complete with 3D embroidery on the front, a custom pattern under the brim, and we're even going to throw in our vinyl sticker pack!

We've partnered with Mafia Bags of San Francisco to bring you the Monolith Action Pack. Normally $100, this special pack made from repurposed kiteboarding kites, sails, and  billboards is designed to carry the Monolith. Never fear getting stuck riding in the rain again. The Action Pack even converts into a regular size bag when not carrying your board. A partnership we are proud to share with you!
The ultra soft and comfortable Inboard Hoodie is the perfect addition to keep you warm when going for an evening ride.
Stay warm with our stylish and comfortable Inboard Jacket. Exclusive to our Kickstarter backers, show your love with this riding essential.

We've been working with the team at Hyrdoflex Skateboards for the design of the Monolith. Their brand new skate deck, the Mahi, is a great traditional skateboard (not motorized), completes with trucks/wheels, and ships immediately after our Kickstarter concludes
**Exclusive to Kickstarter!** These first 25 backers will get the complete Monolith package for just $899!

This includes the Monolith board - ready to ride, RFLX Remote, universal wall charger, USB Connect charger, and Inboard sticker pack.
RETAIL VALUE: $1,399
**Exclusive to Kickstarter!** These first 25 backers will get the complete Monolith package for just $999!

This includes the Monolith board - ready to ride, RFLX Remote, universal wall charger, USB Connect charger, and Inboard sticker pack.
RETAIL VALUE: $1,399
**Exclusive to Kickstarter!** These first 100 backers will get the complete Monolith package for just $1,099!

This includes the Monolith board - ready to ride, RFLX Remote, universal wall charger, USB Connect charger, and Inboard sticker pack.
RETAIL VALUE: $1,399
